# windowType(for:)

**Instance Method**

Called when the type of the window is needed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func windowType(for context: WKWebExtensionContext) -> WKWebExtension.WindowType
```

## Parameters

- **context**: The context in which the web extension is running.

## Discussion

Defaults to[doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtension/WindowType/normal] if not implemented.
